column1: Housing, the Petitioner and the said Thiyagaraja had been informed by a letter

column2: ‘R4’  that  a  decision  had  been  taken  by  the

column1: Commissioner  of  National  Housing  in  terms  of  Section  12(2)  to  sell  the  said
premises to Thiyagaraja. In other words, the Commissioner of National Housing
had recognized that Thiyagaraja was the tenant of the said premises.
